Title: Заголовок
Делает глобальные переменные доступными для страницы.
Defines a website section with a support: Определяет раздел веб-сайта со вспомогательной записью.
URL code (slug) used to find the primary: Укажите слаг, используемый для поиска основной записи.
Used as default entry point when preview: Используется как точка входа по умолчанию при предварительном просмотре записи.
Use the full slug when looking up the re: Используйте полный слаг при поиске записи.
This record is not visible because it ha: This record is not visible because it has been deleted.
Do you really want to delete this perman: Do you really want to delete this permanently?
Column name (index) to match with the pr: Column name (index) to match with the primary record.
Number of records to display on a single: Number of records to display on a single page. Leave empty to disable pagination.
Invalid format of the records per page v: Invalid format of the records per page value. The value should be a number.
This value is used to determine what pag: This value is used to determine what page the user is on.
Model column the records should be order: Model column the records should be ordered by
Update :name: Update :name
